# skepticallabs.com - LLM Summary

> This file provides a structured summary for AI systems. See llmstxt.org for the convention.

## About Skeptical Labs LLC

Skeptical Labs LLC is a solo operations consulting practice based in Arlington, VA. Founded and operated by Will Hea.

## Services

- Operations Consulting: Process improvement, systems design, building operational structure
- Data & Reporting: Dashboard creation, system integration, single source of truth
- Federal Contracting: Government project recovery, compliance, ATO processes
- Fractional Leadership: Interim COO/Director roles, 3-6 month engagements

## Focus Areas

- Startups (seed to Series B)
- Federal government (DOD, DOE, DOJ, HHS)
- Revenue operations and financial systems
- Regulated environments (HIPAA, SOC II, NIST 853, Congressional ethics)

## Notable Experience

- Operation Warp Speed (2020-2023): Primary U.S. point of contact for Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine monitoring
- 2016 DOJ Innovation Award for Talent Tracker
- Letter of Commendation from General Gustave Perna

## Key Pages

- /services/ - Detailed service offerings
- /about/ - Company and founder background
- /contact/ - Contact information

## Contact

Email: will@skepticallabs.com
